SCAN_LOG_PROCESS_STARTED.description: Message send the moment scan process has been initiated.

SCAN_LOG_EXTRACT_TOKEN.description: Message sent before checking Facebook login.

SCAN_LOG_EXTRACT_TOKEN_ERROR.description: Error message sent when the user is not logged into Facebook.

SCAN_LOG_PAGE_REQUEST_ERROR.description: Error while making a request to facebook.com.

SCAN_LOG_PAGE_CONTENT.description: Getting the content of the facebook.com page.

SCAN_LOG_PAGE_CONTENT_ERROR.message: Failed to retrieve Facebook page content.
SCAN_LOG_PAGE_CONTENT_ERROR.description: Error getting the content of the facebook.com page.

SCAN_LOG_BIRTHDAYS_REQUEST.description: Making a request to the Facebook birthdays endpoint.

SCAN_LOG_BIRTHDAYS_REQUEST_ERROR.message: Failed to request Facebook friends' birthday data.
SCAN_LOG_BIRTHDAYS_REQUEST_ERROR.description: Failed to make a request to the Facebook birthdays endpoint.

SCAN_LOG_BIRTHDAYS_CONTENT_ERROR.message: Failed to retrieve Facebook birthdays content.
SCAN_LOG_BIRTHDAYS_CONTENT_ERROR.description: Failed to retrieve content from the Facebook birthdays endpoint.

SCAN_LOG_EXTRACT_BIRTHDAYS.description: Starting to extract birthdays from the fetched data.

SCAN_LOG_EXTRACT_BIRTHDAYS_ERROR.message: Failed to extract birthdays from fetched data.
SCAN_LOG_EXTRACT_BIRTHDAYS_ERROR.description: Error while extracting birthdays from the fetched data.

SCAN_LOG_MERGING_BIRTHDAYS.message: Merging newly scanned birthdays with existing data.
SCAN_LOG_MERGING_BIRTHDAYS.description: Message sent before merging newly scanned birthdays with old data.

SCAN_LOG_STORING_EXTRACTED_BIRTHDAYS.description: Message sent before storing extracted birthdays to local storage.

SCAN_LOG_PROCESS_DONE.description: Message sent after the extraction process is finished.
